name: Clerky
all_locations: Palo Alto, CA, USA; Burlingame, CA, USA; Remote
long_description: Clerky builds software to make legal paperwork easier for startups and their attorneys.  From formation to fundraising to hiring - everything a startup needs.  Thousands of top startups use Clerky to get legal paperwork done safely and efficiently.
one_liner: Makes legal paperwork easy for startups and their attorneys.

name: SimpleLegal
long_description: Legal spend, matter, accrual and IP management software for in-house counsel.
one_liner: Legal Operations for corporate legal teams.

name: Casetext
long_description: Casetext, the most widely used A.I. legal research technology, has been adopted across the legal market from the largest Am Law 100 law firms to solo practices. Its award-winning technology offers both conventional search functionality and its CARA A.I. powered contextual search, focuses on the context of your research to help you find on-point authorities faster. Founded by a team of former litigators from top law firms, as well as Ph.D. data scientists and leading A.I. engineers, Casetext helps legal researchers find the best cases, faster, including many that they would otherwise miss. For more information, visit www.casetext.com or contact our team at contact@casetext.com.
one_liner: We make the world's laws free and understandable.

name: ACLU
long_description:
The ACLU is our nation's guardian of liberty, working daily in courts, legislatures and communities to defend and preserve the individual rights and liberties that the Constitution and laws of the United States guarantee everyone in this country. The ACLU is a nonprofit and nonpartisan organization that has grown from a roomful of civil liberties activists in 1920 to an organization of more than 500,000 members and supporters today. We handle nearly 6,000 court cases annually from our offices in almost every state.

The ACLU is supported by annual dues and contributions from its members, plus grants from private foundations and individuals. We do not receive any government funding. 

We protect:
Your First Amendment rights - freedom of speech, association and assembly; freedom of the press, and freedom of religion. 
Your right to equal protection under the law - protection against unlawful discrimination. 
Your right to due process - fair treatment by the government whenever the loss of your liberty or property is at stake. 
Your right to privacy - freedom from unwarranted government intrusion into your personal and private affairs. 
The ACLU also works to extend rights to segments of our population that have traditionally been denied their rights, including people of color; women; lesbians, gay men, bisexuals and transgender people; prisoners; and people with disabilities.
one_liner: Defender of rights and liberties

name: Lawyaw
long_description: Lawyaw is a vertical SaaS platform focused on enabling the digitization of legal services. Our platform solves a foundational gap in the market by making it easy to incorporate programmable documents into digital workflows. As a result we are transforming the $150B consumer legal services market by making access to legal services faster, cheaper and more convenient. We are currently power over 1,000 law firms and growing quickly, but have so much more to build!
one_liner: Automating document-based workflows

name: Cognition IP
long_description:
Cognition IP is a tech-powered San Francisco based intellectual property law firm with partners who have represented some of the most innovative companies in the world in many aspects of intellectual property planning, including Apple, Salesforce, Purdue, Hewlett Packard, AstraZeneca, and Texas Instruments.

Offering patent and trademark filing and prosecution, innovation harvesting and portfolio management, Cognition IP supports early stage startups to Fortune 500 enterprises with on-demand, flat-fee IP counsel and the results expected from a top-tier firm.

Schedule a complimentary consultation at: https://www.CognitionIP.com
one_liner: Flat-fee patent & trademark counsel with top firm results

name: Regology
long_description: Regology is an AI-powered regulatory intelligence platform that enables compliance, legal, risk, and operations teams to navigate complex regulatory environments across U.S. Federal, all 50 states, and global jurisdictions. At its core, the Smart Law Library™ provides a curated, continuously updated repository of applicable laws and regulations. Three specialized AI agents drive the platform: the Regulatory Change Agent tracks and alerts on jurisdiction-specific developments; the Compliance Agent maps changes to policies, controls, and risks; and the Regulatory Research Agent delivers plain-language summaries, multi-jurisdictional comparisons, and actionable insights—helping teams anticipate change, mitigate risk, and act decisively in fast-evolving regulatory landscapes.
one_liner: AI Agents for Regulatory Compliance

name: Spire Law
long_description: Spire Law represents businesses and business owners in litigation. Spire Tech Services supports the technology development and marketing for Spire Law. Spire Tech Services was part of the Winter 2019 batch.
one_liner: Tech enabled business and employment litigation law firm.

name: Flo Recruit
one_liner: We help law firms hire the best legal talent faster

name: Version Story
long_description: Version Story tackles the inefficient and risky process of managing legal document versions that plagues legal teams. Inspired by powerful software development tools like GitHub, Version Story's visual platform provides intuitive version control and redlining, freeing lawyers to focus on high-value work instead of file management.
one_liner: GitHub for lawyers

name: ROGER
long_description: Sending and signing contracts should be easy. So why is it that existing eSignature tools are all so janky? The last thing you need is a frustrating eSignature tool. That’s why we’re building Roger — a faster, simpler eSignature. Think of it like what Linear did to Jira.
one_liner: The Best Way to Sign Contracts Since Handshakes. Roger that.

name: Trébol
long_description: Trébol provides the document AI infrastructure for modern financial services - from KYB to mortgage underwriting - turning weeks of manual processing into minutes.
one_liner: Your back-office, on autopilot

name: Dioptra
long_description: We help founders and in-house counsels streamline their contract negotiations to close deals faster. We do this by building your contract negotiation playbooks and automating them with AI.
one_liner: Automated contract review with AI

name: Landeed
long_description: Landeed is building India's (then for rest of the world)  fastest and most comprehensive property title search engine. More than 84% of Indian household wealth is stored in real estate, property and land. However, with 2/3rds of all court cases in India dealing with land-related disputes, it is essential that people have accessible public records to both protect themselves against litigation and provide appropriate documentation for facilitating transactions.
one_liner: Landeed is India's fastest property title search engine

name: Common Paper
long_description:
Common Paper is a contracting platform that helps startups close deals with their customers faster and with less risk.

We create standard, open-source contracts for commercial transactions, including NDAs, DPAs, and sales agreements. These are analogous to the SAFE, but are between customers and vendors rather than investors and startups. The standardized format means that data within contracts is structured from inception. 

We build software for managing standard contracts, accelerating sales cycles, and making the data within the contracts programmatically accessible to other business systems.

Tens of thousands of people have downloaded our standard contracts, and 63% of the contracts on our system close within 24 hours.
one_liner: The SAFE for commercial contracts

name: Docsum
long_description: Docsum is a contract intelligence platform designed for legal and finance teams. Using AI, Docsum extracts critical data like renewal dates, obligations, and more into a searchable database. The platform is fully customizable with features like custom field reporting, alerts, and playbook-powered redlining. Getting started is simple—upload contracts or connect Docsum to tools like Google Drive, DocuSign, and more.
one_liner: AI contract repository

name: Pincites
long_description: Pincites makes contract negotiations faster and more consistent for legal teams. Using LLMs, Pincites takes a first pass at reviewing contracts, helping lawyers focus on riskiest parts of their negotiations.
one_liner: Close deals faster with AI for contract negotiation

name: Inlet
long_description:
Attorneys at small- and medium-sized law firms juggle dozens of matters, context-switching throughout the day – and often failing to record their billable time for every task they worked on.

Inlet records these tasks automatically – eliminating painful admin time and increasing their revenue.
one_liner: AI timekeeping for legal professionals.

name: PointOne
long_description: Lawyers have to manually track all their client work in 6-minute increments. PointOne uses AI to completely automate time tracking and bill review, helping law firms collect more revenue and saving lawyers hours each week.
one_liner: Automated time tracking and billing for law firms.

name: Abel
long_description: Abel transforms law firm document review workflows, eliminating the need to choose between depth and breadth. Attorneys use Abel to answer nuanced questions based on the context spread across thousands of documents.
one_liner: Transforming document review for litigation teams

name: Tower
long_description: Tower accelerates transactional due diligence via an AI-powered, centralized diligence platform. By consolidating disparate diligence workflows, Tower helps lawyers stay organized, spot issues earlier, and close deals faster.
one_liner: Legal due diligence platform powered by AI

name: Parley
long_description: Parley automates flat-fee legal work using LLM’s, starting with visa applications for immigration lawyers. Currently, immigration lawyers spend 20+ hours putting together writing-intensive work visas and green cards. We integrate directly into a lawyer's workflow and do all the reading, writing, and compiling — which is 80% of the work required to file a visa application.
one_liner: Automating flat-fee legal work, starting with work visas + green cards

name: RiskAngle
long_description: RiskAngle delivers fast, accurate summaries of unstructured medical records for insurance companies and law firms. Our AI-powered platform enables users to streamline underwriting, expedite claims processing, and prepare cases with confidence.
one_liner: AI medical summaries in minutes

name: Pearson Labs
long_description: Pearson builds AI agents to automate corporate transactions. Large law firms use us to run gigantic books of businesses with AI, reducing their cost of delivery 40-60%. We work with Orrick as our first design partner, starting with M&A due diligence and financings. $3-6T dollars flow through corporate transactions a year and lawyers take home 1-3% as their cut for every transaction ($150B / year). In the long run, we will capture 50% of the corporate transaction market with the top 30 law firms. We will then provide our AI to companies so they can execute these transactions themselves.
one_liner: AI agents to automate corporate transactions

name: Caseflood.ai
long_description: Caseflood.ai helps law firms cut costs by a third and increase average case value by 20% by replacing their entire admin/operations staff with AI agents. It takes care of all admin tasks - from client intake to case analysis to engaging clients - allowing for firms to be run more profitably and wildly more efficient. Caseflood.ai is on a mission to fundamentally change the unit economics of the legal industry.
one_liner: the AI inbound sales team for law firms

name: Gale
long_description: Gale is an immigration tech platform that makes immigration simple for US companies. We've simplified the visa application process, streamlined compliance, and can integrate with HR systems - saving teams time, money and headaches. Through automation, we enable the independent attorneys we coordinate with to maintain quality whilst being more efficient.
one_liner: Fast and Data-Driven Immigration Platform

name: Tire Swing
long_description:
Tire Swing uses AI to power resident and applicant eligibility evaluations for affordable housing.

Our software manages the resident certification and recertification process end-to-end for public and private properties supported by Project Based Rental Assistance, Low Income Housing Tax Credit, and Housing Vouchers. It serves as a drop-in replacement for third-party consultants and auditors, and helps compliance staff complete their work faster and more accurately.
one_liner: AI Powered Affordable Housing Eligibility

name: OpenIntake
long_description: OpenIntake boosts law firm revenue by converting callers into clients 24/7.
one_liner: The AI Front Door For Law Firms

name: TamLabs
long_description: TamLabs transforms Microsoft Word into an AI-native document editor. Our plugin enables instant document changes with git-style previews, automated comment implementation, and formatting preservation.
one_liner: Cursor for Microsoft Word

name: Crimson
long_description: Crimson is the first AI platform purpose-built for complex disputes. Litigation teams use Crimson to analyze case files, draft legal documents and answer case-specific questions. By automating manual workflows throughout the lifecycle of a case, Crimson helps lawyers save more than 10 hours per week on common litigation tasks.
one_liner: The AI Associate for Litigation Lawyers

name: Blueshoe
long_description: Blueshoe is an AI platform for legal research and reasoning designed to capture the structure of legal thought and allow users to work directly within the logic of caselaw. By combining advanced AI with curated legal and proprietary data pipelines, the system allows users build and test arguments with unprecedented clarity.
one_liner: The AI platform for legal reasoning

name: Skope
long_description: Skope builds AI for core legal workflows. We will save your law firm time and help you make more money, with AI.
one_liner: Build a more profitable law firm with AI.

name: Lexi
long_description: At Lexi, we are building AI associates for Corporate Law. Our associates learn your firm's standards and improve with every case, having already handled 135,000+ documents across 7,000+ cases.
one_liner: AI Associates for Corporate Law

name: Patent Watch
long_description:
We automate patent infringement detection. Our software interprets patents, identifies competing products, and generates claim charts showing who’s infringing and how.

Teams use us to:

- Find licensing and litigation targets
- Send cease-and-desist letters
- Find counter litigation
- Sell IP in wind-downs
- Accelerate M&A diligence

We also run AI invalidity and prior-art searches to help your patents hold up in court.

Companies spend up to $50k to file and maintain a single patent over its lifetime, but once it's granted, they let it collect dust. With Patent Watch, you can start turning your patent portfolio into revenue in 10 minutes.
one_liner: AI for detecting patent infringements

name: LegalOS
long_description:
LegalOS is an AI-powered immigration law firm for complex U.S. work visas. 

Our AI agents generate a USCIS-ready petition package in 24–48 hours, including forms, support letters, and a structured evidence memo.

Every case is reviewed and signed by licensed immigration attorneys with 40+ years of experience and a near-100% approval rate, so companies get both speed and reliability. LegalOS already supports O-1, H-1B, L-1A, L-1B, TN, EB-1A, EB-1C, and EB-2 NIW petitions and has a 100% approval rate so far across all visa categories.
one_liner: The AI-powered immigration law firm for complex work visas

name: Arcline
long_description:
Fast and predictable AI-native legal services designed for startups: If you’re a founder tired of spending $ X0k+ and months on a priced round, MSA, ESOP, product compliance, or cross-border legal work, we built Arcline for you. 

Arcline’s 40+ AI-native lawyers deliver legal services fast, quality-assured and affordable. 

So you can sell, raise, hire, and launch in hours, not months.

Arcline lawyers are trained at top schools (Harvard, Stanford, Oxford) and leading firms (Cooley, Goodwin, Fenwick). Trusted by founders backed by YC, Sequoia, a16z, Founders Fund.

We’re delivering the same top tier legal help to you, without the usual delay or cost. 

Discover Arcline if you want legal to stop being the bottleneck or crippling your runway.
one_liner: Fire your law firm: Cheaper and faster AI native lawyers for startups
